sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const UserAbout = ({user: { bio, goalCard, name }}) => { return (
{ bio && (

{name.trim().split(' ')[0]}'s BIO

{bio}

)}

Skill Set

Actual weight: {goalCard.actualWeight ? goalCard.actualWeight : ''}

Goal weight: {goalCard.goalWeight ? goalCard.goalWeight : ''}

Height: {goalCard.height ? goalCard.height : ''}

Kcal: {goalCard.kcal ? goalCard.kcal : ''}

Trainings per week: {goalCard.trainingRate ? goalCard.trainingRate : ''}

) } UserAbout.propTypes = { user: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default UserAbout
